trans-unit.source: Release notes: Microsoft HDInsight Emulator for Azure | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Release notes: Microsoft HDInsight Emulator for Azure | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Get late-breaking information about the most recent releases of the HDInsight Hadoop Emulator, a Hadoop sandbox environment.
trans-unit.target: Get late-breaking information about the most recent releases of the HDInsight Hadoop Emulator, a Hadoop sandbox environment.

trans-unit.source: The easiest way to check the version number is to look in Add/Remove Programs at the entry for Microsoft HDInsight Emulator for Azure (for version 1.0.0.0 or later) or Microsoft HDInsight Developer Preview (for versions earlier than 1.0.0.0).
trans-unit.target: The easiest way to check the version number is to look in Add/Remove Programs at the entry for Microsoft HDInsight Emulator for Azure (for version 1.0.0.0 or later) or Microsoft HDInsight Developer Preview (for versions earlier than 1.0.0.0).

trans-unit.source: This release updates the HDInsight Emulator to target the same set of Hadoop projects that are currently live in the service in version 3.1.
trans-unit.target: This release updates the HDInsight Emulator to target the same set of Hadoop projects that are currently live in the service in version 3.1.

trans-unit.source: As with the preview releases of this product, this release continues to target developer scenarios, and as such supports only single-node deployments.
trans-unit.target: As with the preview releases of this product, this release continues to target developer scenarios, and as such supports only single-node deployments.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Updated Hadoop component versions</linkText><title></title> corresponding to version 3.1 of the service.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Updated Hadoop component versions</linkText><title></title> corresponding to version 3.1 of the service.

trans-unit.source: This includes Hive 0.13 and Tez support.
trans-unit.target: This includes Hive 0.13 and Tez support.

trans-unit.source: This is the generally available (GA) release of the Microsoft HDInsight Emulator for Azure, formerly known as Microsoft HDInsight Developer Preview.
trans-unit.target: This is the generally available (GA) release of the Microsoft HDInsight Emulator for Azure, formerly known as Microsoft HDInsight Developer Preview.

trans-unit.source: As with the preview releases of this product, this release continues to target developer scenarios, and as such supports only single-node deployments.
trans-unit.target: As with the preview releases of this product, this release continues to target developer scenarios, and as such supports only single-node deployments.

trans-unit.source: Scripts have been added to simplify setting all Apache Hadoop services to automatic or manual start.
trans-unit.target: Scripts have been added to simplify setting all Apache Hadoop services to automatic or manual start.

trans-unit.source: The default will still be automatic as before, but all services can now be changed via the set-onebox-manualstart.cmd or set-onebox-autostart.cmd scripts that are installed in C:\Hadoop.
trans-unit.target: The default will still be automatic as before, but all services can now be changed via the set-onebox-manualstart.cmd or set-onebox-autostart.cmd scripts that are installed in C:\Hadoop.

trans-unit.source: The number of required installation dependencies has been reduced significantly, allowing for faster installations.
trans-unit.target: The number of required installation dependencies has been reduced significantly, allowing for faster installations.

trans-unit.source: This version includes a bug fix in the command used to run Pig samples in the RunSamples.ps1 script installed in the GettingStarted folder.
trans-unit.target: This version includes a bug fix in the command used to run Pig samples in the RunSamples.ps1 script installed in the GettingStarted folder.

trans-unit.source: This version contains an update to Hortonworks Data Platform (HDP) version 1.1 that matches the Hortonworks Data Platform services available with Azure HDInsight cluster version 1.6.
trans-unit.target: This version contains an update to Hortonworks Data Platform (HDP) version 1.1 that matches the Hortonworks Data Platform services available with Azure HDInsight cluster version 1.6.

trans-unit.source: The HDInsight dashboard has been removed.
trans-unit.target: The HDInsight dashboard has been removed.

trans-unit.source: This version contains an update to the Hortonworks Data Platform Developer Preview that matches with the Hortonworks Data Platform Preview on Azure HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: This version contains an update to the Hortonworks Data Platform Developer Preview that matches with the Hortonworks Data Platform Preview on Azure HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: This version contains an update to the Hortonworks Data Platform Developer Preview that matches with the Hortonworks Data Platform Preview on Azure HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: This version contains an update to the Hortonworks Data Platform Developer Preview that matches with the Hortonworks Data Platform Preview on Azure HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: This version contains an update to the Hortonworks Data Platform Developer Preview that matches with the Hortonworks Data Platform Preview on Azure HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: This version contains an update to the Hortonworks Data Platform Developer Preview that matches with the Hortonworks Data Platform Preview on Azure HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: Hive Server 2 is now being installed.
trans-unit.target: Hive Server 2 is now being installed.

trans-unit.source: This is required for version 0.9.2.0 of the Microsoft ODBC Driver for Hive, which was released at the same time as this update.
trans-unit.target: This is required for version 0.9.2.0 of the Microsoft ODBC Driver for Hive, which was released at the same time as this update.

trans-unit.source: All services are set to automatic startup, so no more having to start everything again after a machine reboot.
trans-unit.target: All services are set to automatic startup, so no more having to start everything again after a machine reboot.

trans-unit.source: New release of Microsoft HDInsight Developer Preview as well as Hortonworks Data Platform for Windows Developer Preview.
trans-unit.target: New release of Microsoft HDInsight Developer Preview as well as Hortonworks Data Platform for Windows Developer Preview.

trans-unit.source: Includes Apache Hadoop, Hive, Pig, Sqoop, Oozie, HCatalog, and Templeton.
trans-unit.target: Includes Apache Hadoop, Hive, Pig, Sqoop, Oozie, HCatalog, and Templeton.

trans-unit.source: New HDInsight dashboard with the following features:
trans-unit.target: New HDInsight dashboard with the following features:

trans-unit.source: Connect to multiple clusters, including the local installation as well as those running remotely via the Azure HDInsight service.
trans-unit.target: Connect to multiple clusters, including the local installation as well as those running remotely via the Azure HDInsight service.

trans-unit.source: For more information on the HDInsight service, see <linkText>http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/services/hdinsight/</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more information on the HDInsight service, see <linkText>http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/services/hdinsight/</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Configure Azure Blob storage on the local cluster.
trans-unit.target: Configure Azure Blob storage on the local cluster.

trans-unit.source: See detailed instructions below.
trans-unit.target: See detailed instructions below.

trans-unit.source: Author and edit Hive queries in the new interactive Hive console.
trans-unit.target: Author and edit Hive queries in the new interactive Hive console.

trans-unit.source: View and download job history and results.
trans-unit.target: View and download job history and results.

trans-unit.source: The REST API endpoints on a local HDInsight installation and the Azure HDInsight service are accessed through different port numbers for the same services:
trans-unit.target: The REST API endpoints on a local HDInsight installation and the Azure HDInsight service are accessed through different port numbers for the same services:

trans-unit.source: Local: Oozie - http://localhost:11000/oozie/v1/admin/status Templeton - http://localhost:50111/templeton/v1/status ODBC - use port 10000 in DSN configuration or connection string
trans-unit.target: Local: Oozie - http://localhost:11000/oozie/v1/admin/status Templeton - http://localhost:50111/templeton/v1/status ODBC - use port 10000 in DSN configuration or connection string

trans-unit.source: HDInsight service: Oozie - http://ServerFQDN:563/oozie/v1/admin/status Templeton - http://ServerFQDN:563/templeton/v1/status ODBC - use port 563 in DSN configuration or connection string
trans-unit.target: HDInsight service: Oozie - http://ServerFQDN:563/oozie/v1/admin/status Templeton - http://ServerFQDN:563/templeton/v1/status ODBC - use port 563 in DSN configuration or connection string

trans-unit.source: Configuring Azure Blob storage on the local cluster:
trans-unit.target: Configuring Azure Blob storage on the local cluster:

trans-unit.source: In the dashboard, you will see a default local cluster named "local (hdfs)".
trans-unit.target: In the dashboard, you will see a default local cluster named "local (hdfs)".

trans-unit.source: If you want Azure Blob storage as your storage for your local installation, do the following:
trans-unit.target: If you want Azure Blob storage as your storage for your local installation, do the following:

trans-unit.source: Add the account tag in core-site.xml found in C:\Hadoop\hadoop-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT\conf:
trans-unit.target: Add the account tag in core-site.xml found in C:\Hadoop\hadoop-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT\conf:

trans-unit.source: Example:
trans-unit.target: Example:

trans-unit.source: Open the Hadoop command shell on your desktop in elevated mode and run the following command:
trans-unit.target: Open the Hadoop command shell on your desktop in elevated mode and run the following command:

trans-unit.source: Access any file on that account by using the full URI: asv://{container}@{account}/{path} (or asvs:// if you want to use HTTPS for accessing the data).
trans-unit.target: Access any file on that account by using the full URI: asv://{container}@{account}/{path} (or asvs:// if you want to use HTTPS for accessing the data).

trans-unit.source: Example:
trans-unit.target: Example:

trans-unit.source: Delete the currently registered local cluster and re-register it with the new Azure Blob storage credentials.
trans-unit.target: Delete the currently registered local cluster and re-register it with the new Azure Blob storage credentials.

trans-unit.source: The dashboard website has been changed to anonymous authentication instead of using Windows credentials.
trans-unit.target: The dashboard website has been changed to anonymous authentication instead of using Windows credentials.

trans-unit.source: This eliminates the issue with the login prompt mentioned in the release notes for the previous version.
trans-unit.target: This eliminates the issue with the login prompt mentioned in the release notes for the previous version.

trans-unit.source: Some Sqoop bugs with export, and some types of imports, have been fixed.
trans-unit.target: Some Sqoop bugs with export, and some types of imports, have been fixed.

trans-unit.source: The JavaScript console fails to load.
trans-unit.target: The JavaScript console fails to load.

trans-unit.source: See release notes for version 0.2.0.0 for details.
trans-unit.target: See release notes for version 0.2.0.0 for details.

trans-unit.source: The Sqoop command line will display warnings as shown below.
trans-unit.target: The Sqoop command line will display warnings as shown below.

trans-unit.source: These will be fixed in a future update and can be safely ignored.
trans-unit.target: These will be fixed in a future update and can be safely ignored.

trans-unit.source: Introduction of semantic versioning to Windows Installer
trans-unit.target: Introduction of semantic versioning to Windows Installer

trans-unit.source: Fixes for various installation bugs reported on the MSDN forums, particularly around installing the HDInsight dashboard
trans-unit.target: Fixes for various installation bugs reported on the MSDN forums, particularly around installing the HDInsight dashboard

trans-unit.source: Start menu items added for increased discoverability
trans-unit.target: Start menu items added for increased discoverability

trans-unit.source: Fix for Hive console multi-line input
trans-unit.target: Fix for Hive console multi-line input

trans-unit.source: Minor updates to getting-started content
trans-unit.target: Minor updates to getting-started content

trans-unit.source: The JavaScript console fails to load.
trans-unit.target: The JavaScript console fails to load.

trans-unit.source: On some installations, the JavaScript console will fail with an HTTP 404 error displayed on the page.
trans-unit.target: On some installations, the JavaScript console will fail with an HTTP 404 error displayed on the page.

trans-unit.source: To work around this, navigate directly to http://localhost:8080 to use the console.
trans-unit.target: To work around this, navigate directly to http://localhost:8080 to use the console.

trans-unit.source: Browsing to HDInsight Dashboard raises a login prompt.
trans-unit.target: Browsing to HDInsight Dashboard raises a login prompt.

trans-unit.source: We've had some reports of a login dialog being raised during browsing to the HDInsight dashboard.
trans-unit.target: We've had some reports of a login dialog being raised during browsing to the HDInsight dashboard.

trans-unit.source: In that case, you can provide the login information for your current user, and you should be able to browse to the dashboard.
trans-unit.target: In that case, you can provide the login information for your current user, and you should be able to browse to the dashboard.

trans-unit.source: Initial release
trans-unit.target: Initial release

trans-unit.source: Hive console
trans-unit.target: Hive console

trans-unit.source: If a newline is included in the Hive command submitted, you will get a syntax error.
trans-unit.target: If a newline is included in the Hive command submitted, you will get a syntax error.

trans-unit.source: Remove newlines and the query should execute as intended.
trans-unit.target: Remove newlines and the query should execute as intended.

trans-unit.source: Hadoop user password expiration
trans-unit.target: Hadoop user password expiration

trans-unit.source: The password for the Hadoop user may expire, dependent upon your Active Directory policies pushed to the machine.
trans-unit.target: The password for the Hadoop user may expire, dependent upon your Active Directory policies pushed to the machine.

trans-unit.source: The following Windows PowerShell script will set the password to not expire, and can be run from an administrative command prompt:
trans-unit.target: The following Windows PowerShell script will set the password to not expire, and can be run from an administrative command prompt:

trans-unit.source: Temp directory
trans-unit.target: Temp directory

trans-unit.source: The hadoop.tmp.dir file points to the wrong location.
trans-unit.target: The hadoop.tmp.dir file points to the wrong location.

trans-unit.source: Rather than pointing C:\hadoop\hdfs, it points to c:\hdfs.
trans-unit.target: Rather than pointing C:\hadoop\hdfs, it points to c:\hdfs.

trans-unit.source: This bug will be fixed in the next update of HDP bits.
trans-unit.target: This bug will be fixed in the next update of HDP bits.

trans-unit.source: OS restrictions
trans-unit.target: OS restrictions

trans-unit.source: The HDInsight server must be installed on a 64-bit OS.
trans-unit.target: The HDInsight server must be installed on a 64-bit OS.

trans-unit.source: Web Platform Installer (WebPI) search results
trans-unit.target: Web Platform Installer (WebPI) search results

trans-unit.source: HDInsight can't be found in WebPI search results.
trans-unit.target: HDInsight can't be found in WebPI search results.

trans-unit.source: This is typically due to an OS restriction.
trans-unit.target: This is typically due to an OS restriction.

trans-unit.source: HDInsight requires a 64-bit operating system with a minimum version of Windows 7 Service Pack 1, Windows Server 2008 R2 Service Pack 1, Windows 8, or Windows Server 2012.
trans-unit.target: HDInsight requires a 64-bit operating system with a minimum version of Windows 7 Service Pack 1, Windows Server 2008 R2 Service Pack 1, Windows 8, or Windows Server 2012.

trans-unit.source: Administrative command prompt documentation
trans-unit.target: Administrative command prompt documentation

trans-unit.source: In order to run commands such as hadoop mradmin or hadoop defadmin, you must run as the Hadoop user.
trans-unit.target: In order to run commands such as hadoop mradmin or hadoop defadmin, you must run as the Hadoop user.

trans-unit.source: To easily create a shell running as that user, open a Hadoop command prompt and run the following:
trans-unit.target: To easily create a shell running as that user, open a Hadoop command prompt and run the following:

trans-unit.source: This will open a new command shell running with Hadoop administrator privileges.
trans-unit.target: This will open a new command shell running with Hadoop administrator privileges.

trans-unit.target: <linkText>Get started with the HDInsight Emulator[hdinsight-hadoop-emulator-get-started]</linkText><title></title>
